text:
Common e-Seva centres run by Tamil Nadu government’s Elcot is to provide additional services like online registration of applications for competitive exams like TNPSC’s group-I, II, IV and VAO exam.

District Collector A.Gnansekaran in a release said that the e-seva centres in Municipalities, town panchayats, panchayats and Collectorate etc. already provide various services like issuing certificates given by Revenue Department, submitting applications for passport, adhaar etc. – Staff Reporter
title: e-Seva centres to provide more services
